prompt: Scenario: reading-aloud-class. Create a child-friendly, classroom-appropriate illustration. Create a child-friendly, classroom-appropriate illustration for the language learning scenario: "Reading Aloud in Class". Learn to read confidently in front of the class Show an Irish primary school classroom setting with warm, welcoming colors. The illustration should be colorful, engaging, and appropriate for primary school children aged 4-12. CRITICAL: If any Irish text (Gaeilge), signs, labels, or written content appears in the illustration, you MUST include clear English translations or captions alongside the Irish text. This is essential for Chinese students learning English in Ireland.
